hadiths.text: Narrated `Urwa bin Az-Zubair:A woman committed theft in the Ghazwa of the Conquest (of Mecca) and she was taken to the Prophet who ordered her hand to be cut off. `Aisha said, "Her repentance was perfect and she was married (later) and used to come to me (after that) and I would present her needs to Allah's Messenger (ﷺ)

chapter.eng-name: The witness of a person falsely accusing somebody of illegal sexual intercourse and the witness of a thief or an adulterer
